description: Pinniped offers flexible deployment: develop locally, customize, configure, and then run on any VPS with Node.js.
Pinniped lets developers customize logic and APIs using familiar JavaScript (ES6 features, Node API, npm packages) within its Node.js runtime, avoiding the complexities of serverless functions.

snippet: Manage your schema and data with ease.
description: Pinniped's admin UI simplifies data management with intuitive schema definition and data interaction tools.
